attributes.action: not confer any honours on Michael Martin (former Speaker)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In view of Michael Martins attempts to restrict disclosure of MPs expenses, and his own use of Air Miles awarded whilst on official duties to transport family, I urge the Prime minister not to award any honours. This would be seen by the electorate as reward for failure.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
